meanings.sent1: The owl's unwinking gaze scared the mouse.
meanings.sent2: She kept an unwinking eye on the prize.
meanings.sent3: The unwinking statue seemed to be playing a staring contest.
meanings.sent4: His unwinking determination led him to success.
meanings.sent5: The unwinking lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.

meanings.definition: Steady and unchanging in expression or attitude
meanings.sent1: Her unwinking smile reassured everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The unwinking guard stood at his post all night.
meanings.sent3: The unwinking cat refused to move from its spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: His unwinking loyalty never wavered, even in tough times.
meanings.sent5: The unwinking sun rose every morning, bringing light to the world.
